solution_line_template: There are {num_dogs} dogs and they each bark {barks_per_dog_per_minute} times per minute so together they bark {num_dogs}*{barks_per_dog_per_minute} = <<{num_dogs}*{barks_per_dog_per_minute}={combined_barks_per_minute}>>{combined_barks_per_minute} times per minute

{num_dogs} dogs bark a combined total of {combined_barks_per_minute} times per minutes, after {time_in_minutes} minutes they will have barked {combined_barks_per_minute}*{time_in_minutes} = <<{combined_barks_per_minute}*{time_in_minutes}={total_barks}>>{total_barks} times
